title: Design AudioFingerprint computation system architecture
description: Create comprehensive design for AudioFingerprint system including perceptual hashing, spectral analysis, and audio comparison algorithms
notes: Architecture design completed - comprehensive design document created at docs/AUDIO_FINGERPRINT_ARCHITECTURE.md

title: Write integration documentation and performance benchmarks
description: Create comprehensive documentation, integration guides, and performance benchmarks for all audio processing components

title: Implement AudioFingerprint class with perceptual hashing
description: Implement core AudioFingerprint class with perceptual hashing algorithms, configurable parameters, and thread-safe operations

title: Create audio render recording infrastructure
description: Implement audio render recording system that captures audio data for fingerprinting and analysis with various format support

title: Implement spectral analysis capabilities (FFT, band energies, brightness)
description: Create spectral analysis tools including FFT implementation, band energy extraction, and brightness calculation for audio fingerprinting

title: Implement loudness analysis (LUFS, true peak, short-term)
description: Implement loudness measurement algorithms including LUFS, true peak detection, and short-term loudness analysis for audio characterization

title: Create audio embedding generation system
description: Implement audio embedding generation using existing or custom algorithms for semantic audio similarity and style analysis

title: Design audio comparison and similarity metrics
description: Create algorithms and metrics for comparing audio fingerprints and determining similarity scores between audio renders

title: Implement audio feature extraction for style analysis
description: Extract musical and technical features for style analysis including tempo, key, timbre, and other characteristics

title: Create comprehensive test suite with audio test fixtures
description: Develop extensive test suite including unit tests, integration tests, and audio test fixtures for all audio processing components
